title: COP30 host Brazil urges unity as climate summit deadlocked over fossil fuels
description: BELEM, Brazil, (Reuters) – Brazil, host of the COP30 conference, urged countries to unite for a deal to strengthen international climate efforts on Friday, as the summit drifted past its scheduled end with nations deadlocked over whether the accord should set the world on a clearer path away from fossil fuels.The article COP30 host Brazil urges unity as climate summit deadlocked over fossil fuels appeared first on Stabroek News.

title: Fossil fuel fight threatens to sink COP30 as negotiations run into overtime
description: Negotiations at COP30 climate talks in Brazil ran into overtime on Saturday with no agreement struck and delegates still locked in a bitter fight over whether to mention fossil fuels in the final text.
